data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Maluku Utara who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maluku Utara, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Maluku Utara, Indonesia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Maluku Utara to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Maluku Utara. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Ternate people.
Please, convict the 33,307 believers in Maluku Utara, Indonesia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Maluku Utara, Indonesia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Maluku Utara, Indonesia has a population of 1,038,100.

We estimate Maluku Utara has 33,307 people who might know Jesus, 83,676 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 921,117 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Maluku Utara, Indonesia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Maluku Utara
location.people_groups_list: Malay, North Moluccan, Malay, Bacanese, Waioli, Gamkonora, Kadai
